title: Mystic Moose and WowWee Join Forces To Create Planet Mojo Toys Connected to Blockchain - Decrypt
description: Boston, United States, April 11th, 2024, Chainwire   Leading Web3 gaming ecosystem teaming up with globally recognized toy company, renowned for bringing beloved game characters to life. Planet Mojo, a leading web3 gaming ecosystem, and WowWee, an award winning global toy company with such hits as Fingerlings and Robosapien, today announced a collaboration to create […]
